title: Pesto lemon chicken
description: Mary's take on the classic Mediterranean tricolore salad but with cucumber instead of mozzarella and added chicken. Each serving provides 382kcal, 27g protein, 12g carbohydrate (of which 10g sugars), 24g fat (of which 4g saturates), 6g fibre and 0.6g salt.
ingredients: 3 cooked chicken breasts, skinned, boned, halved horizontally and sliced into thin strips
2 large ripe avocados, peeled and sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
